pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-minecraft-data=====================|pypi|_Provide easy access to `minecraft-data <https://github.com/PrismarineJS/minecraft-data>`__ in pythonInstallation------------From PyPi:``pip install minecraft_data``From Repo:``python -m pip install git+https://github.com/SpockBotMC/python-minecraft-data``Usage-----See the `example.py <https://github.com/rom1504/python-minecraft-data/blob/master/example.py>`__Documentation-------------- See `doc/api.md <https://github.com/rom1504/python-minecraft-data/blob/master/doc/api.md>`__- See `doc/history.md <https://github.com/rom1504/python-minecraft-data/blob/master/doc/history.md>`__.. |pypi| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/minecraft_data.svg.. _pypi: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/minecraft_data
